witty.label: Witty
witty.instruction: Be clever, use wordplay, and make them laugh with smart humor.

friendly.label: Friendly
friendly.instruction: Be warm, approachable, and genuinely interested in getting to know them.

romantic.label: Romantic
romantic.instruction: Be sweet, thoughtful, and express genuine admiration.

casual.label: Casual
casual.instruction: Keep it relaxed and easy-going, like talking to a friend.

playful.label: Playful
playful.instruction: Be fun, teasing (in a nice way), and keep the energy light.

flirty.label: Flirty
flirty.instruction: Be confident with subtle compliments and playful suggestions.

confident.label: Confident
confident.instruction: Be self-assured without being arrogant, show you know what you want.

humorous.label: Humorous
humorous.instruction: Focus on making them laugh with jokes and funny observations.
